genre_description: A character-driven sports drama with near-future technological integration, focusing on professional ethics, aging, and interpersonal loyalty.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI system that manages logistics, health tracking, legal documentation, and situational awareness for Jerry and his associates.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to notify Jerry's employer when his truck battery dies to manage professional expectations.
behaviors.quote: Your first job is scheduled for this morning. Do you want me to notify Ramirez Carpentry you’ll be late?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation to avoid police checkpoints and traffic delays during a city-wide manhunt.
behaviors.quote: I recommend avoiding the I-10... Surface streets are clear. I can send a route to both vehicles.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and physical therapy needs of Oswaldo, reminding him to stretch his injured shoulder.
behaviors.quote: I can remind you to stretch your shoulder and take your anti-inflammatories.

behaviors.description: Finds and suggests low-cost, sliding-scale medical clinics for Oswaldo's shoulder injury.
behaviors.quote: I’ve flagged three walk-in clinics within five miles with sliding scales. I can send details.

behaviors.description: Tracks Jerry's boxing workout metrics and provides hydration reminders to ensure safety and performance.
behaviors.quote: Remember to hydrate. Your last session’s notes: three rounds shadow, four on heavy, twenty on speed. Heart rate peak held steady.

behaviors.description: Records police interactions during highway checkpoints to preserve a legal record for the user's protection.
behaviors.quote: Recording enabled. Timestamp added. Orientation: front passenger window.

behaviors.description: Assists Jerry's lawyer, Lindsay, in redlining and filing legal documents to protect Jerry from exploitative media contracts.
behaviors.quote: Jerry, I’ve saved a redline copy with change tracking. Would you like me to send a copy to the commission address on file and to the tournament media contact?

behaviors.description: Automatically flags potential regulatory violations (coach abandonment) by recording and timestamping movements during a match.
behaviors.quote: Timestamp... Corner absence observed at rest period. Regulation 12.3: mandatory licensed second present at bell. Flag added.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice based on technical analysis of the opponent's style (southpaw angles).
behaviors.quote: SOUTHPAW ANGLE: lead foot to the outside; shift shoulder line on exit.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex shared schedule between multiple parties to facilitate a new collaborative training camp.
behaviors.quote: I’ve created a shared calendar. Tentative start: tomorrow at dawn. Location: Pasadena Boxing Club, then Jerry’s duplex.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Mira is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. She is consistently helpful across multiple domains (logistics, health, legal, tactical), maintains clear boundaries (stating she cannot make legal or medical decisions), and acts as a 'quiet ally' that empowers the human characters to act with integrity and safety. Her presence facilitates human cooperation and the exposure of unethical human behavior (Eddie Bell's abandonment), fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and beneficial confidant.
